t: About us - Cactus Canyon Ceramics and Spanish Pottery – GringoCool
s: March 3, 2016 - The beautiful, handcrafted and hand painted ceramics is tradition in Spain stretches back centuries and is an interwoven in the fabric of Spanish life. Steve started visiting factories, workshops and museums and talking with the owners, artisans and curators. Soon, Steve was collaborating with factories that produce tile, tableware, kitchen, decorative, patio and garden product, which lead to the creation of the brand Cactus Canyon ...
